channel.title: How do I make a client connect to my no-ip
channel.description:
I recently downloaded an open client and source. I was just wondering how I could get the client to connect to my no-ip. Someone said there was a tut on here but I was unable to find it. Please help me! :) Thank you!
Edit: Scratch that. I figured it out.
